name: Ricetta: frittelle di loto
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Lotus Flower Crisp.

value.name: Mandorla
value.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Burro
value.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

value.name: Zucchero
value.desc: Un dolcificante derivato dai Fiordolci. Ha il potere di rallegrare e dare energia.

value.name: Frittelle di loto
value.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Reward from reaching Reputation Level 4 in Liyue</color>
